## Summary
The Charlotte Hornets upset the Cleveland Cavaliers 119-111, with Kon Knueppel leading the way with 29 points, 4 rebounds, and 3 assists. Brandon Miller added 25 points, improving Hornets to 8-18 while Cavaliers dropped to 15-12.
